faq.label: FAQs
faq.title: Quick answers
faq.description: If you don’t see your question here, just get in touch.

items.question: What kind of irrigation or drainage work do you do?
items.answer: We focus on practical garden improvements and clear recommendations. Tell us the issue (pooling water, dry beds, etc.) and we’ll advise what’s worth doing.

items.question: Can I send photos?
items.answer: Yes—photos help us understand the issue and quote accurately.

items.question: When is the best time to address drainage?
items.answer: Any time you’re seeing problems, but seasonal timing can help. We’ll advise when quoting.

items.question: Will it be disruptive?
items.answer: It depends on the scope. We’ll outline what’s involved before starting.

items.question: Do you cover my area?
items.answer: Send your postcode and we’ll confirm availability.

finalCta.title: Got a wet patch or beds that struggle in dry spells?
finalCta.description: Tell us what’s happening (and send photos if you can) and we’ll recommend a practical fix—then quote it clearly.
